name: Aesthetic & Simple Daily Workspace Planner
description: Do you struggle to finish tasks because you're busy hopping different apps to manage your daily tasks?With this aesthetic and simple daily workspace planner, I solve that problem for you.In this Notion template, you get to focus on your daily tasks and zero in on significant things that need your attention. The template simplifies tracking and management and restricts your app hopping to one simple yet powerful workspace.Reasons WHY you should get this tracker:1) Transform your daily work routin
